Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of homeless services to educate homeless persons on domestic violence
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the dept of homeless services to educate homeless persons on domestic violence.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to a record of the unsheltered homeless population
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Record of the unsheltered homeless population.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of social services and the department of homeless services to offer training to certain individuals in administering opioid antagonists
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring that certain Dept of Homeless Services employees be trained in administering opioid antagonists.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to creating a continuum of care steering committee to advise the department of homeless services, and to the responsibilities of the interagency coordinating council, and to repeal section 21-306 of the administrative code of the city of New York, relating to the homeless services advisory board
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring the formation of an interagency coordinating council to combat homelessness.

Items.Title: Oversight - Reforms to Homeless Services, One Year Later.

Items.MatterName: Oversight - Reforms to Homeless Services, One Year Later.

Items.MatterName: Updating the report on utilization of and applications for multi-agency emergency housing assistance.
